alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; DeKalb; Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 5:12PM EDT until August 28 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cherokee County in north central Georgia... Northwestern DeKalb County in north central Georgia... Eastern Cobb County in north central Georgia... North central Fulton County in north central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 512 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vinings, or near Marietta, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Canton, Mountain Park, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Alpharetta, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Milton, Woodstock, Holly Springs, Ball Ground, Fair Oaks, Buffington, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Mount Bethel, Hickory Flat, and Vinings. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
